metadata.synopsis: Halsin permanently leaves the party after his approval of the bonded avatar continues to drop.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Lower Halsin's approval rating further after his second warning.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: This is where we must part ways. I hoped it wouldn't be necessary, but no... I cannot turn a blind eye to your actions any longer.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: Farewell. May the Oak Father keep you - for I will not.
